1ce406d0f669631e32213a151071f1798409e3ce.caption:
Steak Tacos with Avocado Salsa… easy, delicious and absolutely bursting with flavour. The tacos are loaded with juicy, marinated, cooked-to-perfection steak topped with a fresh, creamy, tangy and slightly spicy avocado salsa. I used flap steak here (highly underrated cut IMO) but you can sub skirt, flank or ribeye. The marinade is also amazing on chicken. For the salsa, if you like it spicy, add more jalapeño or serrano. If you want it mild, remove the seeds or just omit the chiles altogether. Serve on your favourite warmed tortillas, top with some fresh cilantro + onion and charred scallions on the side
.
Comment the word “taco” below to get the full recipe sent directly to your DMs. Or visit my blog www.cookprimalgourmet.com by clicking the link in my bio

recipe.title: Steak Tacos with Avocado Salsa
recipe.description: Easy, delicious and absolutely bursting with flavour. The tacos are loaded with juicy, marinated, cooked-to-perfection steak topped with a fresh, creamy, tangy and slightly spicy avocado salsa.

ingredients.name: flap steak (can substitute skirt, flank or ribeye)
jalapeño or serrano chiles (optional, to taste)

instructions: Marinate the steak (flap, skirt, flank, or ribeye).
Cook the steak to desired doneness.
Prepare the avocado salsa by combining avocado with jalapeño or serrano chiles (adjust amount for desired spiciness).
Warm the tortillas.
Slice the cooked steak.
Assemble tacos with steak on tortillas.
Top with avocado salsa.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and onion.
Serve with charred scallions on the side.

fe2be910d78a4609c9f4b99684a2da30c515da52.caption:
Chicken taco bowl recipes ⬇️

Made this for dinner & meal preps last week and it was 🤌🏼

Cilantro lime rice🍚
1 C long-grain jasmine rice, rinsed and drained
1½ cups water
1 tsp garlic, minced (or could use garlic powder)
1 tsp lime zest
1½ Tbsp fresh lime juice
½ C finely chopped fresh cilantro
1 tsp chicken bouillon

Add all ingredients to a pot or rice cooker & cook rice as normal. Fluff & enjoy! 

Chicken marinade🍗
*for 1-1.5 lbs chicken thighs
4 Tbsp orange juice
1½ Tbsp fresh lime juice
3 cloves garlic, minced
1½ Tbsp chili powder
2 tsp dried oregano
2 tsp paprika
1 teaspoon salt
1/2 tsp pepper

Marinate boneless, skinless chicken thighs for 1 hour, up to overnight. Grill or smoke the chicken until cooked through. I love throwing them on the @traegergrills because they stay so moist! Let rest and then chop into bite sized pieces. 

Cilantro lime crema🌿
1 C full fat greek yogurt
2 Tbsp mayo
1 Tbsp fresh lime juice
¼  tsp garlic powder
½ tsp salt
¼ tsp onion powder
½ C fresh cilantro
Optional: 1/4 jalapeño 

Blend, thin with milk or water as needed to reach your desired consistency. 

The rest:
•pickled onions (thinly sliced red onion, covered in lime juice & a pinch of salt then refrigerated for a couple of hours)
•red bell pepper (thinly sliced, sautéed with salt & pepper in a bit of avocado oil) 
•black beans (rinsed & drained)

What’s your go to dinner at the moment? Please share in the comments! 💬

recipe.title: Chicken Taco Bowl
recipe.description: A flavorful chicken taco bowl with cilantro lime rice, marinated chicken thighs, cilantro lime crema, and fresh toppings.

items.name: long-grain jasmine rice, rinsed and drained
garlic, minced (or could use garlic powder)
red onion, thinly sliced (for pickled onions)

instructions: For the Cilantro Lime Rice: Add all rice ingredients to a pot or rice cooker and cook rice as normal. Fluff and enjoy when done.
For the Chicken Marinade: Combine all marinade ingredients and marinate boneless, skinless chicken thighs for 1 hour, up to overnight.
Grill or smoke the chicken until cooked through. Let rest and then chop into bite-sized pieces.
For the Cilantro Lime Crema: Blend all crema ingredients together. Thin with milk or water as needed to reach your desired consistency.
For the Pickled Onions: Cover thinly sliced red onion in lime juice with a pinch of salt, then refrigerate for a couple of hours.
For the Bell Peppers: Sauté thinly sliced red bell pepper with salt and pepper in a bit of avocado oil.
Prepare black beans by rinsing and draining them.
Assemble the taco bowls with rice as the base, topped with chicken, black beans, sautéed bell peppers, pickled onions, and cilantro lime crema.

4daed0f96b7e876e05ca2ffa3efbc01bcdf98d60.caption:
This soy garlic chicken is one of my families all time favorite recipes. It’s a simpler version  of my mom’s soy garlic fried chicken.  The chicken is pan-fried until super crispy and then glazed with this 5 ingredient sauce. Make sure to double the glaze amount below if you want some extra sauce to put on your rice. Follow me for more simple recipes like this.

Please see recipe below:
For the chicken 
-4 boneless skin on chicken thighs lightly salted 
-1/4C cornstarch
-2tbs neutral oil for pan-frying

Sauce:
-3tbs butter
-3tbs minced garlic
-1tbs minced ginger
-4tbs light brown sugar
-4tbs kikoman light soy sauce 

Garnish with scallion greens thinly sliced

recipe.title: Soy Garlic Chicken
recipe.description: A simpler version of soy garlic fried chicken. The chicken is pan-fried until super crispy and then glazed with a 5 ingredient sauce.

ingredients.name: boneless skin on chicken thighs, lightly salted

instructions: Lightly salt the boneless skin-on chicken thighs
Coat the chicken thighs with cornstarch
Heat neutral oil in a pan for frying
Pan-fry the chicken until super crispy
For the sauce, melt butter in a pan
Add minced garlic and ginger to the melted butter
Add light brown sugar and Kikkoman light soy sauce
Glaze the crispy chicken with the sauce
Garnish with thinly sliced scallion greens
Serve (double the glaze amount if you want extra sauce for rice)
